alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 12:02AM EDT until September 25 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Miami-Dade County in southeastern Florida... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1201 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over The Hammocks, or near The Redland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Miami, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, The Redland, Doral, Sweetwater, West Miami, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Zoo Miami, The Hammocks, Coral Terrace, Olympia Heights, and West Kendall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
